knimeNode.name: Call Workflow
knimeNode.shortDescription: Executes another workflow and obtains the results for further processing.

fullDescription.intro: Executes another workflow and obtains the results for further processing in this workflow.

ports.dynInPort: The inputs for the execution. Number and types of the ports must exactly match the inputs of the workflow provided at the workflow port.
ports.dynOutPort: The outputs of the execution. Number and types of the ports must exactly match the outputs of the workflow provided at the workflow port.
